text:
SALEM

Ramakrishna Mission Ashrama: Swami Vivekananda Jayanti, homam, 10.30 a.m.; discourse by Swami Yatatmananda, 11.30 a.m.; discourse by Narai S. Nellaiappan, 6.30 p.m.

Arulmigu Azhagirinatha Swami Temple, Fort: Sri Andal Tirukalyana Mahorchavam, navakalasa stapana tirumanjanam, neerattam, kattiyam sevithal, 6 a.m.; upanyasam on ‘Nachiar vaibavam’ by N. Kulasekara Ramanujadasan, 10 a.m.; tirukalyana special alankaram, maalai matrudal, 10.30 a.m.;

Sathupadi Sri Azhagirinatha Perumal, 11 a.m.; tirukalyana mahotsavam, 11.30 a.m.; tiruveedi ula, 4 p.m.

Shree Adinath Swetambar Jain Naya Mandir, Sankar Nagar: Maha Kumbabishekam, 10.30 a.m.

Jamia Irfaniya Arabic College: ‘Vendru Kattuvom’ motivation programme for SSLC and Plus Two students, A. Sabir Ahmad, neonatologist and K. Noorul Anas, head trainer of communication skills development, Afxano Academy Private Limited, Chennai, resource persons, Azad nagar, 9.30 a.m.

Department of ECE of Dheerajlal Gandhi College of Technology and ECE Association of National Institute of Technology Tiruchi: Workshop on ‘Internet of things’, seminar hall, 9 a.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology: State level inter-school and inter-collegiate chess tournament, 9 a.m.

Thangam Mount Litera Zee School: Interactive workshop on ‘art of parenting’ by G. Manivannan, founder, Heart and Soul Foundation, 9.30 a.m. and 2 p.m.

Cooptex: Handloom textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Pongal Festival handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.
title: engagements
